Merced.Gracey (Leontine) Elementary School: Gracey (Leontine) Elementary School is an elementary school located in Merced, California which educates grades kindergarten to fifth. Current enrollment is approximately 700 students 368 of which are socioeconomically disadvangated. 74.1% of the students qualify for the free lunch program; an additional 13.5% qualify for the reduced lunch.
